column1: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. - Steve Jobs

column2: we will remember not the words of our enemies
column3: but the silence of our friends. - Martin Luther King Jr.

column2: failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts. - Winston Churchill

column1: Believe you can and you're halfway there. - Theodore Roosevelt
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. - Franklin D. Roosevelt
The best way to predict the future is to invent it. - Alan Kay
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling
column2: but in rising every time we fall. - Nelson Mandela

column1: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions. - Dalai Lama
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans. - John Lennon
The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing. - Edmund Burke
